summary:
Remove the images that display on the left side of the load screens. It requires that you use the launcher to load the game and that you choose the Load Loose Files option.

This mod was created at the request of a specific user on the official forums. A proper README will follow later.
descriptionHtml:
Remove the images that display on the left side of the load screens. It requires that you use the launcher to load the game and that you choose the Load Loose Files option.

This mod was created at the request of a specific user on the official forums. A proper README will follow later.
author: Silverglade
